hackathon-description-text: HackSmith is Smith College’s annual hackathon. Sponsored by Smith’s Computer Science club, “Smithies in CS”, students from all over the east coast will be invited to Smith’s campus for our 24-hour hackathon in April.
hackathon-eligibility: All participants must either be currently pursuing a degree or taking time off from school with the intent of returning.
hackathon-rules: Because we want to create a safe environment emotionally and physically for all members of HackSmith 2018, please follow the following set of code of conduct:
